name: Enter The Concert
description:
Description: 

Welcome to the world of "Enter The Concert" - a fun and engaging point-and-click adventure game that takes you on a journey through the eyes of a poor robot who dreams of attending the Iron Maiden concert.

In this game, you play as the lovable and resourceful robot who must use his wits and ingenuity to find the items necessary to create a fake concert ticket.

Your ultimate goal is to make it to the Iron Maiden concert, but to do so, you'll need to gather a range of items from around the game world. These items can be combined in different ways to create a fake concert ticket that will get you past the gatekeepers and into the concert of a lifetime.

So come join our robot hero on his quest to see Iron Maiden, and see if you have what it takes to create the ultimate fake concert ticket in this exciting new point-and-click adventure game.

Credits:

Enter The Concert was made in 1 small week with a team of 6 !

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer

- Aubart Adam, Environment Artist 

- Zalisz valentin, Game Artist

- Hache Arthur, Game Designer

- Masson Jean-Loup, Game Designer

- Charlet Ludovic, Game Designer

How to Play :

Mouse only!
